kylian mbappe.name: Kylian Mbappé
kylian mbappe.why_get_them: The fastest and most explosive attacker in the game. A guaranteed goalscorer.
kylian mbappe.tactical_significance: The ultimate weapon for any system. Excels in counter-attacks or as a lone striker.

kevin de bruyne.name: Kevin De Bruyne
kevin de bruyne.why_get_them: The best passer in the game, period. Can unlock any defense with a single ball.
kevin de bruyne.tactical_significance: The perfect #10 or offensive #8 in a 4-3-3. Will be the primary chance creator.

erling haaland.name: Erling Haaland
erling haaland.why_get_them: A generational talent. An unstoppable combination of size, speed, and lethal finishing.
erling haaland.tactical_significance: The ultimate target man and poacher. A pure #9 who will be the focal point of all attacks.

karim benzema.name: Karim Benzema
karim benzema.why_get_them: The ultimate all-around forward. Scores, assists, and links up play better than almost anyone.
karim benzema.tactical_significance: Perfect as a false 9 (CF) or in a two-striker system where he can drop deep and create.

lionel messi.name: Lionel Messi
lionel messi.specialities: Dribbler, Playmaker, Finesse Shot, Set Piece Taker
lionel messi.why_get_them: The best dribbler and creator in the game. Unmatched on the ball and a free kick specialist.
lionel messi.tactical_significance: Best used as a free-roaming RW or CAM where he can drift inside and create or score.

robert lewandowski.name: Robert Lewandowski
robert lewandowski.why_get_them: A pure goalscoring machine. If he gets a chance in the box, it's over.
robert lewandowski.tactical_significance: The ideal lone striker (#9) in a possession-based system (4-3-3 or 4-2-3-1) that creates a high volume of chances.

thibaut courtois.name: Thibaut Courtois
thibaut courtois.why_get_them: Arguably the best shot-stopper in the game. Wins you points on his own.
thibaut courtois.tactical_significance: A reliable, traditional goalkeeper. Provides immense security for any defensive system.

mohamed salah.name: Mohamed Salah
mohamed salah.why_get_them: A consistent and lethal goalscorer from the wing. His pace and finishing are elite.
mohamed salah.tactical_significance: A perfect inside forward in a 4-3-3. Will be your primary goal threat, cutting in from the right.

manuel neuer.name: Manuel Neuer
manuel neuer.why_get_them: The original and best sweeper keeper. His distribution is as good as a midfielder.
manuel neuer.tactical_significance: Essential for a high-line defense. He acts as an 11th outfielder, stopping through balls.

virgil van dijk.name: Virgil van Dijk
virgil van dijk.why_get_them: A complete central defender. Dominant in the air, composed on the ball, and impossible to beat 1v1.
virgil van dijk.tactical_significance: The anchor for any defense. His presence allows your full-backs to attack with confidence.

cristiano ronaldo.name: Cristiano Ronaldo
cristiano ronaldo.why_get_them: One of the greatest goalscorers of all time. His finishing and aerial ability are still unmatched.
cristiano ronaldo.tactical_significance: A pure box-to-box striker. Needs service, but will convert any chance he gets.

harry kane.name: Harry Kane
harry kane.specialities: Complete Forward, Playmaker, Long Shot Taker
harry kane.why_get_them: The complete striker. Scores like a #9, assists like a #10. Elite passing.
harry kane.tactical_significance: Can play as a lone ST or drop deep as a CF to link up play with fast wingers.

casemiro.name: Casemiro
casemiro.why_get_them: The best pure defensive midfielder in the world. A wall in front of your defense.
casemiro.tactical_significance: The perfect anchor in a 4-3-3 or a 4-2-3-1, providing complete defensive security.

alisson.name: Alisson
alisson.why_get_them: A complete, modern goalkeeper. Elite 1v1, great distribution, and acrobatic.
alisson.tactical_significance: Perfectly balanced for any system, whether you play a high line or sit deep.

joshua kimmich.name: Joshua Kimmich
joshua kimmich.why_get_them: A world-class deep-lying playmaker with a relentless engine. Can also play RB.
joshua kimmich.tactical_significance: The 'regista' for a possession-heavy team. Controls the entire tempo of the game from deep.

n'golo kante.name: N'Golo Kanté
n'golo kante.why_get_them: He has three lungs. An unparalleled ball-winning machine who covers every blade of grass.
n'golo kante.tactical_significance: The perfect box-to-box or defensive midfielder in a 4-3-3. Does the work of two players.

jan oblak.name: Jan Oblak
jan oblak.why_get_them: Incredible fundamentals. He catches everything and is rarely, if ever, out of position.
jan oblak.tactical_significance: A pure, rock-solid shot-stopper. Ideal for a team that sits deep and invites shots.

ederson.name: Ederson
ederson.top_stats: GK Kicking: 93, GK Reflexes: 88, GK Positioning: 88
ederson.why_get_them: His distribution is a weapon. He can launch a counter-attack from his own box.
ederson.tactical_significance: The ultimate high-line sweeper keeper. He acts as an 11th outfielder, stopping through balls.

neymar jr.name: Neymar Jr
neymar jr.why_get_them: A true magician on the ball. If you love to skill and create, he's your man.
neymar jr.tactical_significance: The ultimate creative LW or CAM. Needs a free role to drift and cause havoc.

rodri.name: Rodri
rodri.why_get_them: The most complete CDM in the game. Unbeatable defensively and a world-class passer.
rodri.tactical_significance: The perfect single pivot. He can anchor a 4-3-3 by himself, protecting the defense and starting attacks.

heung min son.name: Heung Min Son
heung min son.why_get_them: One of the most clinical finishers in the game. His 5-star weak foot makes him a threat anywhere.
heung min son.tactical_significance: A goalscoring winger (Inside Forward). Perfect for a 4-3-3 or 4-2-3-1 where he is the main goal threat.

toni kroos.name: Toni Kroos
toni kroos.why_get_them: A midfield general with near-perfect passing. Dictates the entire pace of the game.
toni kroos.tactical_significance: A deep-lying playmaker (regista). Sits in a 4-3-3 and sprays pinpoint passes to the wings.

bernardo silva.name: Bernardo Silva
bernardo silva.why_get_them: A creative attacking midfielder with the work rate of a defensive mid. Incredibly press-resistant.
bernardo silva.tactical_significance: A versatile CAM, CM, or RW. His endless stamina is perfect for a high-pressing system.

marquinhos.name: Marquinhos
marquinhos.why_get_them: A fast, intelligent, and composed modern center-back. Reads the game perfectly.
marquinhos.tactical_significance: Perfect for a high-line defense. His pace and awareness allow him to handle quick strikers 1v1.

ruben dias.name: Rúben Dias
ruben dias.why_get_them: A traditional, no-nonsense defender. A pure wall that dominates attackers physically.
ruben dias.tactical_significance: The leader of a back four. Sits deep and organizes the defensive line.

luka modric.name: Luka Modrić
luka modric.why_get_them: Ageless wonder. His creativity, agility, and flair on the ball are still world-class.
luka modric.tactical_significance: A perfect offensive-minded #8 in a 4-3-3. Will be the primary ball-carrier from midfield.

marc-andre ter stegen.name: Marc-André ter Stegen
marc-andre ter stegen.why_get_them: A complete modern keeper who is as good with his feet as he is with his hands.
marc-andre ter stegen.tactical_significance: Ideal for a possession-based team that wants to build up from the back.

joao cancelo.name: João Cancelo
joao cancelo.why_get_them: A midfielder playing at full-back. One of the most creative defenders in the game.
joao cancelo.tactical_significance: An inverted full-back who drifts into midfield to add an extra man and create chances.

antoine griezmann.name: Antoine Griezmann
antoine griezmann.why_get_them: A supremely intelligent and hard-working forward. He is a master of creating space and finding a pass.
antoine griezmann.tactical_significance: The ultimate False 9 (CF) or support striker. Will drop deep to link play and still arrive in the box.

frenkie de jong.name: Frenkie de Jong
frenkie de jong.why_get_them: The ultimate press-resistant midfielder. Can receive the ball under pressure and carry it 40 yards.
frenkie de jong.tactical_significance: A "carrier" CM. Perfect for breaking the lines and transitioning from defense to attack.

antonio rudiger.name: Antonio Rüdiger
antonio rudiger.why_get_them: A defensive monster. His combination of top-tier pace and strength is incredibly rare for a CB.
antonio rudiger.tactical_significance: The perfect high-line defender. Can catch any striker in a foot race.

kalidou koulibaly.name: Kalidou Koulibaly
kalidou koulibaly.why_get_them: An absolute mountain of a man. He will physically bully any striker he faces.
kalidou koulibaly.tactical_significance: A classic, powerful center-back ideal for a deep defensive line.

trent alexander-arnold.name: Trent Alexander-Arnold
trent alexander-arnold.why_get_them: Your team's entire offense can run through him from right-back. The best crosser in the game.
trent alexander-arnold.tactical_significance: An attacking full-back who acts as the primary chance creator for a 4-3-3.

bruno fernandes.name: Bruno Fernandes
bruno fernandes.why_get_them: A creative machine with a relentless work rate. A high-risk, high-reward chance creator.
bruno fernandes.tactical_significance: The definitive #10 in a 4-2-3-1. Every attack will go through him.

gianluigi donnarumma.name: Gianluigi Donnarumma
gianluigi donnarumma.why_get_them: A massive presence in goal with phenomenal reflexes. Very difficult to beat.
gianluigi donnarumma.tactical_significance: A well-rounded, elite shot-stopper that fits any defensive system.

lautaro martinez.name: Lautaro Martínez
lautaro martinez.why_get_them: A tenacious and clinical striker. A pitbull who fights for every ball and has a lethal shot.
lautaro martinez.tactical_significance: An "advanced forward" (AF) who presses high and excels in a two-striker partnership.

gregor kobel.name: Gregor Kobel
gregor kobel.why_get_them: One of the best young goalkeepers in the world. Phenomenal reflexes.
gregor kobel.tactical_significance: A top-tier shot-stopper who can be the foundation of a team for years.

federico valverde.name: Federico Valverde
federico valverde.why_get_them: A pacy, powerful, and tireless box-to-box midfielder who can also play on the wing.
federico valverde.tactical_significance: The perfect "shuttler" or #8 in a 4-3-3. His work rate is a massive asset.

david alaba.name: David Alaba
david alaba.why_get_them: A world-class, ball-playing center-back who can also play LB or CDM. A leader.
david alaba.tactical_significance: Perfect for a possession-based team that wants to build up from the back.

eder militao.name: Éder Militão
eder militao.why_get_them: An athletic freak. He is both incredibly fast and dominant in the air.
eder militao.tactical_significance: An aggressive, front-foot defender who excels in a high-line, high-press system.

andrew robertson.name: Andrew Robertson
andrew robertson.why_get_them: A tireless attacking left-back who will run up and down the wing for 90 minutes.
andrew robertson.tactical_significance: A key attacking piece for a 4-3-3. Provides all the width on the left flank.

aymeric laporte.name: Aymeric Laporte
aymeric laporte.why_get_them: A composed, left-footed, ball-playing defender. His passing from the back is elite.
aymeric laporte.tactical_significance: A must-have for a 3-at-the-back system (as the LCB) or a possession-based back four.

milan skriniar.name: Milan Škriniar
milan skriniar.why_get_them: An old-school, tough-tackling defender who is immensely strong.
milan skriniar.tactical_significance: A pure defensive anchor. Perfect for a deep line or as the central CB in a back three.

vinicius jr..name: Vinícius Jr.
vinicius jr..why_get_them: One of the fastest, most exciting players in the world. An elite 1v1 dribbler.
vinicius jr..tactical_significance: The star player for a counter-attacking team. Give him the ball and let him run.

rafael leao.name: Rafael Leão
rafael leao.why_get_them: A unique combination of tall, strong, and incredibly fast. A complete offensive mismatch.
rafael leao.tactical_significance: A "target winger" who can also be used as a striker in a two-man system.

kingsley coman.name: Kingsley Coman
kingsley coman.why_get_them: Blistering pace and elite dribbling on either wing. A nightmare for full-backs.
kingsley coman.tactical_significance: A classic, pacy winger. Stretches the play in a 4-4-2 or 4-3-3.

theo hernandez.name: Theo Hernández
theo hernandez.why_get_them: The fastest full-back in the game. An offensive weapon.
theo hernandez.tactical_significance: A 4-3-3 full-back who acts as a secondary winger, overlapping constantly.

sadio mane.name: Sadio Mané
sadio mane.why_get_them: A well-rounded attacker with great pace, dribbling, and finishing. Very reliable.
sadio mane.tactical_significance: A versatile forward who can play LW, RW, or CF in any attacking system.

paul pogba.name: Paul Pogba
paul pogba.why_get_them: On his day, an unstoppable force. A tall, strong, skillful, and creative midfielder.
paul pogba.tactical_significance: A creative #8 in a 4-3-3 or a CAM in a 4-2-3-1 where he has freedom to attack.

leon goretzka.name: Leon Goretzka
leon goretzka.why_get_them: A physical monster in midfield. A true box-to-box threat who dominates physically.
leon goretzka.tactical_significance: The perfect, athletic box-to-box CM in a 4-4-2 or 4-3-3.

marco verratti.name: Marco Verratti
marco verratti.why_get_them: A midfield metronome. Impossible to get the ball from, and a fantastic passer.
marco verratti.tactical_significance: A "regista" or deep-lying playmaker who controls possession and recycles the ball.

niklas sule.name: Niklas Süle
niklas sule.why_get_them: A rare combination of massive strength (95) and surprisingly high pace (85).
niklas sule.tactical_significance: A dominant CB who can anchor a back four or play as a pacy RB if needed.

ciro immobile.name: Ciro Immobile
ciro immobile.why_get_them: An elite finisher who is always in the right place at the right time.
ciro immobile.tactical_significance: A pure poacher. Needs service, but will be the focal point of a 4-3-3 or 4-5-1.

jude bellingham.name: Jude Bellingham
jude bellingham.why_get_them: The ultimate box-to-box midfielder. He can do everything: defend, dribble, pass, and score.
jude bellingham.tactical_significance: Can play any of the three midfield roles in a 4-3-3. The heart of any team.

jamal musiala.name: Jamal Musiala
jamal musiala.why_get_them: A slippery, highly agile attacking midfielder who glides past defenders.
jamal musiala.tactical_significance: A perfect #10 in a 4-2-3-1 or a creative, free-roaming #8.

christopher nkunku.name: Christopher Nkunku
christopher nkunku.why_get_them: A pacy and creative hybrid forward. A massive threat on the counter.
christopher nkunku.tactical_significance: A versatile attacker. Ideal as a False 9, a CAM, or a wide forward.

matthijs de ligt.name: Matthijs de Ligt
matthijs de ligt.why_get_them: A young, strong, and dominant center-back with great leadership qualities.
matthijs de ligt.tactical_significance: A commanding presence in a back four. Will win every aerial duel.

pedri.name: Pedri
pedri.why_get_them: A technical midfield maestro. Amazing vision, passing, and work rate.
pedri.tactical_significance: The creative hub of a 4-3-3, similar to Iniesta. Links the midfield and attack.

nicolo barella.name: Nicolò Barella
nicolo barella.why_get_them: A relentless, high-energy box-to-box midfielder who is also great on the ball.
nicolo barella.tactical_significance: A perfect "shuttler" in a 3-5-2 or an aggressive #8 in a 4-3-3.

kyle walker.name: Kyle Walker
kyle walker.why_get_them: The fastest pure defender in the game. A recovery challenge master.
kyle walker.tactical_significance: A defensive full-back. His pace allows him to lock down any winger 1v1.

riyad mahrez.name: Riyad Mahrez
riyad mahrez.why_get_them: A silky-smooth dribbler with 5-star skills and a deadly finesse shot.
riyad mahrez.tactical_significance: A playmaking winger. Cuts inside from the right to create or score with his left foot.

marcos acuna.name: Marcos Acuña
marcos acuna.why_get_them: A pitbull at left-back. Incredibly strong and aggressive, with great delivery.
marcos acuna.tactical_significance: A balanced full-back who can defend physically and contribute to the attack with crosses.

diogo jota.name: Diogo Jota
diogo jota.why_get_them: A natural-born goalscorer. His 5-star weak foot makes him clinical from any angle.
diogo jota.tactical_significance: A versatile forward. Can play as a poacher (ST), a false 9 (CF), or an inside forward (LW).

phil foden.name: Phil Foden
phil foden.why_get_them: An elite creative player with incredible agility and balance. Glides on the ball.
phil foden.tactical_significance: A playmaking winger or CAM. Perfect for a possession system that needs to break down a low block.

marcus rashford.name: Marcus Rashford
marcus rashford.specialities: Pace Merchant, Long Shot Taker, 5-Star Skills
marcus rashford.why_get_them: A physical and pacy forward with a rocket of a shot. A constant big-play threat.
marcus rashford.tactical_significance: A direct, counter-attacking winger or striker. Uses his pace to get in behind.

bukayo saka.name: Bukayo Saka
bukayo saka.why_get_them: A reliable, high-energy winger who contributes in both attack and defense.
bukayo saka.tactical_significance: A hard-working, modern winger. Perfect for a 4-3-3 system that requires its forwards to press.

dominik szoboszlai.name: Dominik Szoboszlai
dominik szoboszlai.specialities: Long Shot Taker, Playmaker, Set Piece Taker
dominik szoboszlai.why_get_them: Possesses one of the best long-range shots in the game. A dead-ball specialist.
dominik szoboszlai.tactical_significance: A goalscoring CAM. Sits behind the striker and fires rockets from outside the box.

declan rice.name: Declan Rice
declan rice.why_get_them: A complete, modern defensive midfielder. Reads the game, intercepts passes, and drives forward.
declan rice.tactical_significance: A fantastic single pivot in a 4-3-3 or part of a double-pivot in a 4-2-3-1.

sandro tonali.name: Sandro Tonali
sandro tonali.why_get_them: A complete midfielder who combines Italian defensive grit with elegant playmaking.
sandro tonali.tactical_significance: A true box-to-box midfielder (CM) who contributes everywhere on the pitch.

josko gvardiol.name: Joško Gvardiol
josko gvardiol.why_get_them: A "Rolls-Royce" defender. Fast, strong, and incredibly comfortable on the ball.
josko gvardiol.tactical_significance: A modern CB perfect for a high line. Can also play as a defensive LB.

stefan de vrij.name: Stefan de Vrij
stefan de vrij.why_get_them: A smart, composed, and traditional center-back. Excellent positioning.
stefan de vrij.tactical_significance: A reliable CB for a back three or back four who holds the line.

koke.name: Koke
koke.why_get_them: A manager's dream. A high-stamina workhorse who is also a very reliable passer.
koke.tactical_significance: A balanced, hard-working CM in a 4-4-2 or a box-to-box role.

yann sommer.name: Yann Sommer
yann sommer.why_get_them: An agile and dependable keeper known for fantastic reflex saves.
yann sommer.tactical_significance: A solid, reliable, traditional goalkeeper for any system.

dusan tadic.name: Dušan Tadić
dusan tadic.why_get_them: A pure #10 playing on the wing. An elite creator who will rack up assists.
dusan tadic.tactical_significance: A wide playmaker. Drifts inside to overload the midfield and play killer through balls.

marcos llorente.name: Marcos Llorente
marcos llorente.why_get_them: A cheetah in midfield. His combination of 90+ pace and 90+ stamina is game-breaking.
marcos llorente.tactical_significance: The ultimate utility man. Can play CM, RM, or even RB. A counter-attacking monster.

raheem sterling.name: Raheem Sterling
raheem sterling.why_get_them: Incredibly fast and agile. A top-tier dribbler who lives in the opponent's box.
raheem sterling.tactical_significance: A classic, direct winger who will run in behind or take on his man 1v1.

paulo dybala.name: Paulo Dybala
paulo dybala.specialities: Dribbler, Finesse Shot, Set Piece Taker
paulo dybala.why_get_them: A silky-smooth CAM with a lethal left foot. A magician in tight spaces.
paulo dybala.tactical_significance: The creative hub of a 4-2-3-1 or as a CF/False 9.

thomas muller.name: Thomas Müller
thomas muller.why_get_them: The 'Space Invader'. His 95 positioning is one of the highest in the game. He's always open.
thomas muller.tactical_significance: A supporting forward (CF) or CAM. He doesn't create play, he *finds* play. A poacher from midfield.

raphael varane.name: Raphaël Varane
raphael varane.why_get_them: A world-champion defender. He combines good pace with elite defensive awareness.
raphael varane.tactical_significance: A calm, reliable, and pacy CB perfect for any top-tier back four.

jules kounde.name: Jules Koundé
jules kounde.why_get_them: A fast, aggressive defender who can also play RB. Wins everything in the air despite his height.
jules kounde.tactical_significance: His versatility is key. Can be a shutdown CB or a very pacy, defensive Right-Back.

achraf hakimi.name: Achraf Hakimi
achraf hakimi.why_get_them: One of the fastest attacking full-backs in the game. A constant threat down the right flank.
achraf hakimi.tactical_significance: A RWB in a 3-5-2 or a very aggressive RB in a 4-3-3. He is a primary attacker.

gavi.name: Gavi
gavi.why_get_them: A pitbull. A high-stamina, high-aggression midfielder who is also a gifted dribbler.
gavi.tactical_significance: A perfect, aggressive #8 in a 4-3-3 pressing system. Wins the ball back high.

dayot upamecano.name: Dayot Upamecano
dayot upamecano.why_get_them: An athletic specimen. He is incredibly fast and incredibly strong.
dayot upamecano.tactical_significance: A front-foot, aggressive CB who is perfect for a high-press, high-line system.

reece james.name: Reece James
reece james.why_get_them: The complete package at RB. Strong, pacy, great on the ball, and a brilliant crosser.
reece james.tactical_significance: A do-it-all full-back. Can play as a traditional RB, an attacking RWB, or even a CB.

dusan vlahovic.name: Dušan Vlahović
dusan vlahovic.why_get_them: A big, strong, left-footed striker with a lethal shot. A classic #9.
dusan vlahovic.tactical_significance: A powerful target man. Perfect for a team that loves to cross the ball.

fikayo tomori.name: Fikayo Tomori
fikayo tomori.why_get_them: Pure recovery speed. His 90 pace for a CB is elite, allowing him to catch anyone.
fikayo tomori.tactical_significance: The ultimate high-line defender. Built to stop counter-attacks all by himself.

alphonso davies.name: Alphonso Davies
alphonso davies.why_get_them: The 'Roadrunner'. The fastest full-back in the game, an electric dribbler.
alphonso davies.tactical_significance: A pure attacking wing-back. Best used in a 3-5-2 or as a 4-3-3 LB who bombs forward.

rodrygo.name: Rodrygo
rodrygo.why_get_them: A fast, agile, and clinical winger who is always a goal threat. 5-star skills.
rodrygo.tactical_significance: A versatile attacker. Perfect as an inside forward (RW/LW) or as a pacy second striker.

florian wirtz.name: Florian Wirtz
florian wirtz.why_get_them: A prodigious young talent. A highly creative CAM with fantastic vision and dribbling.
florian wirtz.tactical_significance: The primary creator for your team. Sits in the #10 hole and unlocks defenses.

dani carvajal.name: Dani Carvajal
dani carvajal.why_get_them: A reliable, high-stamina full-back who is solid defensively and a good crosser.
dani carvajal.tactical_significance: A well-balanced, traditional RB. Fits any 4-at-the-back system perfectly.

kieran trippier.name: Kieran Trippier
kieran trippier.why_get_them: One of the best crossers and set-piece takers in the league. A dead-ball specialist.
kieran trippier.tactical_significance: An offensive RB. Your primary source of crosses from the right side.

leroy sane.name: Leroy Sané
leroy sane.why_get_them: Blistering speed and a rocket of a shot. A constant threat from the wing.
leroy sane.tactical_significance: A direct, counter-attacking winger. Perfect for a 4-4-2 or 4-3-3.

ronald araujo.name: Ronald Araújo
ronald araujo.why_get_them: A top-tier athlete. He is both extremely fast and extremely strong.
ronald araujo.tactical_significance: A dominant, aggressive CB who can handle any type of striker 1v1.

lisandro martinez.name: Lisandro Martínez
lisandro martinez.why_get_them: The 'Butcher'. Incredibly aggressive, tough-tackling, and a superb passer from the back.
lisandro martinez.tactical_significance: A ball-playing LCB. His aggression and passing make him ideal for a high press.

thiago silva.name: Thiago Silva
thiago silva.why_get_them: Pure defensive intelligence. He lacks pace but makes up for it with perfect positioning.
thiago silva.tactical_significance: The perfect central CB in a back three, or a deep-lying CB in a back four.

luis diaz.name: Luis Díaz
luis diaz.why_get_them: A direct, hard-working, and pacy winger who never stops running.
luis diaz.tactical_significance: A perfect high-pressing winger (LW) for a 4-3-3 system.

william saliba.name: William Saliba
william saliba.why_get_them: A young, pacy, and incredibly composed defender. A future 88+ OVR player.
william saliba.tactical_significance: A modern, ball-playing CB who is comfortable in a high line or a deep block.

cristian romero.name: Cristian Romero
cristian romero.why_get_them: A hyper-aggressive defender who loves a tackle. A true warrior at the back.
cristian romero.tactical_significance: A "stopper" CB. He steps up to win the ball, perfect alongside a calmer "cover" defender.

bremer.name: Bremer
bremer.why_get_them: An athletic monster. Dominant in the air and incredibly strong.
bremer.tactical_significance: A physically imposing CB perfect for a back three or for man-marking a big striker.

pau torres.name: Pau Torres
pau torres.why_get_them: A classy, left-footed ball-playing defender. His passing breaks the press.
pau torres.tactical_significance: The ideal LCB for a team that wants to build possession from the back.

presnel kimpembe.name: Presnel Kimpembe
presnel kimpembe.why_get_them: A very fast and very strong left-footed CB. A rare and valuable combination.
presnel kimpembe.tactical_significance: A fast, aggressive LCB who can cover for an attacking full-back.

ibrahima konate.name: Ibrahima Konaté
ibrahima konate.why_get_them: One of the fastest center-backs in the game. A pure athlete.
ibrahima konate.tactical_significance: The ultimate high-line defender, perfect for stopping pace abusers.

john stones.name: John Stones
john stones.why_get_them: A supremely elegant, ball-playing defender. Can also step into midfield (CDM).
john stones.tactical_significance: A "libero" or ball-playing CB. Essential for a team that values possession.

christian eriksen.name: Christian Eriksen
christian eriksen.why_get_them: A master passer. His vision and set-piece delivery are still absolutely world-class.
christian eriksen.tactical_significance: A deep-lying playmaker or CAM who can spray passes and control the game's tempo.

piotr zielinski.name: Piotr Zieliński
piotr zielinski.why_get_them: A highly agile, creative, and two-footed (5-star weak foot) midfielder.
piotr zielinski.tactical_significance: A versatile and unpredictable CAM or attacking #8.

raphinha.name: Raphinha
raphinha.why_get_them: A pacy, tricky, and direct winger with a great left-footed shot.
raphinha.tactical_significance: A classic inside forward. Cuts in from the right wing to shoot or create.

federico chiesa.name: Federico Chiesa
federico chiesa.why_get_them: An explosive and direct winger who can play on either flank. A counter-attack specialist.
federico chiesa.tactical_significance: A hard-working, pacy winger. Frighteningly direct.

moussa diaby.name: Moussa Diaby
moussa diaby.why_get_them: One of the fastest players in the game. His acceleration is a cheat code.
moussa diaby.tactical_significance: A pure, direct winger. Gets in behind the defense with ease.

ousmane dembele.name: Ousmane Dembélé
ousmane dembele.why_get_them: The ultimate wildcard. 5-star skills and 5-star weak foot make him completely unpredictable.
ousmane dembele.tactical_significance: A dynamic winger who can play on either side and beat his man to create chaos.

domenico berardi.name: Domenico Berardi
domenico berardi.specialities: Finesse Shot, Long Shot Taker, Set Piece Taker
domenico berardi.why_get_them: A creative winger with a deadly left-footed finesse shot. A great budget alternative.
domenico berardi.tactical_significance: A playmaking inside forward who cuts in from the right.

diego carlos.name: Diego Carlos
diego carlos.why_get_them: A physically dominant, aggressive center-back. A wall.
diego carlos.tactical_significance: CB who will physically challenge every forward he faces.

gerard moreno.name: Gerard Moreno
gerard moreno.why_get_them: A smart, technical, and well-rounded striker who can score and create.
gerard moreno.tactical_significance: who can link up play, not just poach goals.

jorginho.name: Jorginho
jorginho.why_get_them: A deep-lying playmaker who controls the game with his passing and composure. Never misses a pen.
jorginho.tactical_significance: for a possession-heavy team. Will not run, but will never lose the ball.

mikel oyarzabal.name: Mikel Oyarzabal
mikel oyarzabal.why_get_them: A highly intelligent and clinical forward who can play wide or as a striker.
mikel oyarzabal.tactical_significance: A smart inside forward who drifts into central areas to score goals.

lorenzo pellegrini.name: Lorenzo Pellegrini
lorenzo pellegrini.why_get_them: A hard-working, creative CAM who contributes on both ends of the pitch.
lorenzo pellegrini.tactical_significance: A perfect box-to-box CAM in a 4-2-3-1 or an offensive #8 in a 4-3-3.

cody gakpo.name: Cody Gakpo
cody gakpo.why_get_them: A tall, fast, and strong forward who is versatile.
cody gakpo.tactical_significance: Can be a lone ST, a CF, or a wide forward. A great, flexible attacker.

lucas hernandez.name: Lucas Hernández
lucas hernandez.why_get_them: A tenacious, left-footed defender who can play both CB and LB.
lucas hernandez.tactical_significance: A huge asset. Can be an aggressive LCB or a very solid, defensive-minded LB.

mason mount.name: Mason Mount
mason mount.why_get_them: An all-action attacking midfielder. He presses, he runs, and he can create.
mason mount.tactical_significance: A perfect pressing-forward (CAM) in a 4-2-3-1 or a high-energy #8.
